Why web?

Know more

Why web?

Everyone has access to the web!

Developing a local app is fun and helpful (I use my multiclip app very often). But it is very exciting to create something that everyone can see and enjoy. Not only that, but it increases the opportunities to get feedback and improve your projects. Not everyone would download your app (even windows complains after a simple "Hello world!"). But it is way easier to visit a website, either from your PC or from your smartphone.

Robofriends

Practice project developed with react. It displays some cards with images generated from robodash. The information in the card is obtained from jsonplaceholder and you can find cards by name using the text box. It was also helpful to learn a little about hooks and redux.

See Live Source Code

Tic Tac Toe

A website to play Tic Tac Toe locally. It shows who moves next and the score. It displays in a more convenient size if you are playing on a mobile device. The next goal is to creade a 3D version, which is more interesting to play.

See Live Source Code

Background generator

A website to generate a beautiful background. The technologies used are HTML, CSS and JS.

See Live Source Code
